title: Border, 2010-31-69, 1928–29
provenance: Donor purchased the two Grantil sample books from a private collector in France ca. 2000. For the remaining non-Grantil pieces, the French, Belgian and English papers were acquired from various sources in Europe, while the American samples were acquired from private collections in the United States.
description: The center contains  two pink roses and other, smaller flowers contained within a  a white oval, which is cut off by a rectangular frame. On each side of the frame are white, rococo-inspired tendrils. Along the top of the border is line of small prink flowers and blue buds with a white background. Below this is another vertically stripe in green with a thin, indulating brown line. The bottom of teh border contains the same line of pink flowers. The background of the middle section is a soft blue.
